titles.title: Providing for the concurrence by the House with amendments in amendment of the Senate to H.R. 821.

action.text: Mr. Montgomery moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/18/1994--Introduced. Provides for taking from the Speaker's table H.R. 821 (extending eligibility for burial in national cemeteries to persons who have 20 years of service creditable for retired pay as members of a reserve component of the armed forces) and agreeing to the Senate amendment thereto with amendments.
